title: Mississippi Safe Schools Information-Sharing Act of 2026; enact.
subject: Appropriations
Education

extras.summary: AN ACT TO ENACT THE "MISSISSIPPI SAFE SCHOOLS INFORMATION-SHARING ACT OF 2026"; TO ESTABLISH A SECURE STATEWIDE ONLINE STUDENT SAFETY RISK-ASSESSMENT TRACKING AND INFORMATION-SHARING SYSTEM IN COORDINATION WITH THE JUVENILE COURT SYSTEM AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS; TO REQUIRE TIMELY DATA ENTRY OF RISK ASSESSMENTS; TO PROVIDE LIMITED ACCESS FOR PRIVACY PURPOSES; TO REQUIRE BEHAVIORAL THREAT ASSESSMENT AND MANAGEMENT (BTAM) TRAINING FOR CERTAIN DISTRICT LEADERSHIP; TO REQUIRE LOCAL LAW ENFORCEMENT NOTIFICATION TO A JUVENILE'S SCHOOL DISTRICT OF A JUVENILE FELONY ARREST WITHIN 24 HOURS AND AUTHORIZE TRANSMISSION THROUGH THE SYSTEM; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
